title: Chat Disconnect
body:
I am unable to connect to chat servers and it's really starting to annoy me!
I keep getting the "reconnect to chat" button in the lower left hand corner of my screen when I am on the League of Legends main screen, it does not effect my gameplay or any other element other than being frustrating and annoying that I am unable to connect to the servers. This has never happened to me before, has anyone got a fix for it?

Thanks in advance, 
Andrew

replies.body:
Could be an issue with the WAY your computer connects to the internet. Firstly, make sure you have the latest Windows Updates (inclusive of any updates to Internet Explorer, I think the current version is 11). Then, after that, reset your settings to default.

If all that does work, then methodically work your way through this: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

It's mostly about connecting to games themselves but it'll help you connect to chat nevertheless.
